overview: "Kasia and Tomek" is a comedy series that follows the lives of a young, educated, and quirky couple in a big city. The show is based on the French series "Un gars, une fille" by Guy A. Lepage and explores the idea that opposites attract. The innovative editing and urban setting perfectly capture the fast-paced, contemporary city life that the couple experiences together.
title: Kasia and Tomek: Part 1
